feed.title: Mailu Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mailu: 2024.06.28
entry.content:
Changelog :mailbox:

  • Include error messages for LMTP

  • This release was triggered by PR/Issue 3696.

  • The release notes of the original main release can be accessed via menu item 'Release notes' on mailu.io.

Update

The main version X.Y (e.g. 1.9) will always reflect the latest version of the branch. To update your Mailu installation simply pull the latest images `docker compose pull && docker compose up -d`.

The pinned version X.Y.Z (e.g. 1.9.1) is not updated. It is pinned to the commit that was used for creating this release. You can use a pinned version to make sure your Mailu installation is not suddenly updated when recreating containers. The pinned version allows the user to manually update. It also allows to go back to a previous pinned version.

entry.title: New release for Mailu: 2024.06.29
entry.content:
Changelog :mailbox:

  • Add the mariadb connector, as per #3449

  • This release was triggered by PR/Issue 3449.

  • The release notes of the original main release can be accessed via menu item 'Release notes' on mailu.io.

entry.title: New release for Mailu: 2024.06.31
entry.content:
Changelog :mailbox:

  • Modern docker versions enable the userland-proxy by default, clarify in setup that unless the bindto address is specific that will create problems.

  • This release was triggered by PR/Issue 3680.

  • The release notes of the original main release can be accessed via menu item 'Release notes' on mailu.io.

Update

The main version X.Y (e.g. 1.9) will always reflect the latest version of the branch. To update your Mailu installation simply pull the latest images `docker compose pull && docker compose up -d`.

The pinned version X.Y.Z (e.g. 1.9.1) is not updated. It is pinned to the commit that was used for creating this release. You can use a pinned version to make sure your Mailu installation is not suddenly updated when recreating containers. The pinned version allows the user to manually update. It also allows to go back to a previous pinned version.

entry.title: New release for Mailu: 2024.06.32
entry.content:
Changelog :mailbox:

  • autoconfig shouldn't set useGlobalPreferredServer

  • This release was triggered by PR/Issue 3721.

  • The release notes of the original main release can be accessed via menu item 'Release notes' on mailu.io.
